Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.web

Class Cloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.oeuvres.alix.web.Cloud
  • public class Cloud
extends Object
    Word Cloud in HTML from Pierre Lindenbaum https://github.com/lindenb/jsandbox/blob/master/src/sandbox/MyWordle.java Rewrited with no deps. Works, but is not nice.
